title: Add emotional state (angry, sad, happy, worried, upset) to plant health results

requirements.summary: Update the Plant type and useAssessPlant mutation hook to expose the emotion field from the backend response
acceptanceCriteria: The Plant type/interface used in the frontend includes an `emotion` field of type string.
The `useAssessPlant` hook correctly passes through the `emotion` value returned by the backend.
No TypeScript compilation errors related to the Plant type.

file_operations.description: Update the useAssessPlant mutation hook to ensure the Plant interface includes the emotion field. The backend already returns PlantEmotion enum via the Plant type in backend.d.ts, so verify that the mutation correctly passes through this emotion value in the returned Plant object without transformation.
